I am a __Software & Product Engineer__, with a passion for building business-oriented software solutions with clean code & architecture, and value-driven product development ü´°.

> üî≠ Currently, I'm being unstoppable as a __Chief Product Officer__ and Development Team Lead at [NFCtron](https://nfctron.com/en).

<h3>My Favorite Stack</h3>

When I code, I mostly work with **TypeScript**, specifically for **React.js** in the frontend and **Node.js** in the backend together with **PostgreSQL**.

<h2>üöÄ Growing the NFCtron Team</h2>

At NFCtron, we're always looking for exceptional people to join our mission!
If you have ambitions to __grow__, __learn__ and __inspire others__, NFCtron is the right place for you.

<h3>Work with me and my team on exciting projects like:</h3>

- üì≤ __NFCtron Bianca__: Crucial POS mobile app enabling fastest and secure payments at events and also supporting ticketing check-in and access control system.
- üé´ __NFCtron Tickets__: Web-based online event ticketing, seat reservation and cashless top-up system.
- üõ∏ __NFCtron Hub__: Motherboard of the whole NFCtron ecosystem, also a B2B home for event organizers, sellers, and partners.
- üõ∞ __NFCtron API__: The backbone of all NFCtron products connecting them to the world and to each other in a fast, secure and scalable way.
- üé™ __NFCtron Mobile Apps__: Our B2C Android and iOS apps for attendees and soon for our payment cardholders.
- üì≤ __NFCtron Nautilus & Terminal Management System__: We decided to build our own fully certified and PCI compliant Mobile Terminal SoftPOS solution, will you build with us?
- üí≥ __NFCtron Nebula & Card Management System__: We have also acquired a Issuing license and will issue our own payment NFCtron cards. Is this your next challenge?
- _...and many more exciting journeys ahead!_ üè¶ üëÄ

> [!NOTE]
> üåê Check out our opportunities at [nfctron.com](https://nfctron.com/cs/kariera).


<h2 align="left">üìö My Academic Contributions</h2>

<h3>
<a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/filipditrich/master-thesis/main/thesis/dist/main.pdf">Cashless Festival Data Analysis and Analytical Dashboard Development</a>
</h3>
<p>
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Type-Diploma Thesis-darkblue" />
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Field-Software_Engineering_and_Big_Data-moccasin" />
</p>

_By processing over 141,000 transactions using NFCtron's cashless payment system, this thesis examined payment data from a Czech festival to provide insights on income sources, system performance, and consumer behavior. The effort resulted in an interactive dashboard prototype to show these results, so enabling festival planners to make better data-driven decisions and so highlight the possibilities of advanced analytics in event management._

<h3>
<a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/filipditrich/bachelor-thesis/main/dist/main.pdf">Web-based Ticketing Solution with Seat Reservation</a></h3>
<p>
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Type-Bachelor Thesis-blue" />
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Field-Software Development-moccasin" />
</p>

_Emphasizing frontend development using React.js, TypeScript, and other modern web technologies, this thesis sought to create a modern web-based ticketing application with seat reservation capabilities. The project produced a completely working, responsive prototype shown at [seating-map.vercel.app](https://seating-map.vercel.app), proving the value of user-centered design in producing efficient ticketing systems._
